00046 #include <stdio.h>
00047 #include "filter.h"
00048 #include "conversion.h"
00049 #include "ueac.h"
00050 #include "external_flash.h"
00051 #include "ueaclib.h"
00052 #include "timer.h"
00053 
00054 ueac_t ueac_state;
00055 char command[100];
00056 channel_t pin_data[25];
00057 ueacval_t conversion_result;
00058 volatile int timer_tick;
00059 unsigned char led_screen_enable=0;
00060 unsigned char high_time_limit[25] = {1,1,1,1,1,
00061                                      1,1,1,1,1,
00062                                      1,1,1,1,1,
00063                                      1,1,1,1,1,
00064                                      1,1,1,1,2};

00066 #define LLA_TABLE ueac_state->lla_table
00067 
00068 void init_pin_data_structure(void) {
00069   int i;
00070   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00071     initialize_channel_structure(&pin_data[i]);
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void init_ueac_state_structure(void) {
00076   int i;
00077   char ch; 
00078   ueac_state.lla_input=0;
00079   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00080     ueac_state.pin_current[i]=0;
00081     ueac_state.lla_table[i].in_pin=0xFF;
00082     ueac_state.lla_table[i].out_pin=0xFF;
00083   }
00084 
00085   // Load calibration data from external flash
00086   start_main_array_read(0,0); 
00087   ch=send_spi_byte(0);
00088   if (ch=='V') {
00089     // valid calibration, proceed with load
00090     for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00091       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_200uA_offset=(char)send_spi_byte(0);
00092     }
00093     for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00094       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_zero_offset=(char)send_spi_byte(0);
00095     }
00096     for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00097       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_floor=(char)send_spi_byte(0);
00098     }
00099     for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00100       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_offset=(char)send_spi_byte(0);
00101     }
00102     end_main_array_read();
00103     //    for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00104     //  printf ("%d %d ",i,ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_200uA_offset);
00105     //  printf ("%d ",ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_zero_offset);
00106     //  printf ("%d ",ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_floor);
00107     //  printf ("%d\n\r",ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_offset);
00108     //    }     
00109   }
00110   else {
00111     // no cal, load defaults 
00112     for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00113       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_200uA_offset=0x00;
00114       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_zero_offset=0x00;
00115       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_floor=0x00;
00116       ueac_state.pin_cal[i].i_in_offset=0x00;
00117     }
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 void init_global_variables (void) {
00122   init_pin_data_structure();   
00123   init_ueac_state_structure();
00124   timer_tick=0;
00125   led_screen_enable=0;
00126 }
